column5: Its looking like the Fins that we slaughtered are going to pull an upset against the USA boys....  Gotta love this tournament
Canada and the Cheqs next.....looking forward to this one ....hopefully no upsets for us today
Ah you awoke from christmas eve. Did ya get a toung from da cod me son? LMAO   Im on the fence with our byes.Lets see after tonight.  As for the USA,well,lets just let the games play out.
Mark Visentin is out tonight... for comparison purposes.  I have a signed Mark Visentin Hockey Card so I was cheering for him.  Go Can Go!
yeah B im pretty sure it was a fish that someone wearing red was kissing  ....next day was pretty rough though still not sure im alright yet...lol...ive learned my lesson...never mix rum and beer
pretty good game....even better now we have some insurance
strome and connolly too .....wedgewood is playing a wicked game...hell of a pass
Here we go again .....Denmark gets to meet their dimise on ice...
Visentin needs a perfect game! Wedgewood played extremely well last night, good enough to play against the U.S.
the score horn has gone off soo many times in this hockey game .....its reminding me of a traffic jam
